SAINT.Name: Apostles of the Seventy Herodion (Rodion), Agabus, Asyncritus, Rufus, Phlegon and Hermes (1st C)

Sts Apôtres des 70 Herodion, Agabos, Rufus, Phlegon et Asyncrite
